description: A subclass of 2n-node trivalent planar graphs without triangles.
references: D. A. Holton and B. D. McKay, The smallest non-hamiltonian 3-connected cubic planar graphs have 38 vertices, J. Combinat. Theory, B 45 (1988), 305-319.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: P. Flajolet and R. Schott, Non-overlapping Partitions, Continued Fractions, Bessel Functions and a Divergent Series In European Journal of Combinatorics, Vol. 11, 1990, pp. 412-432.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
